steps.command: output=$(tmsh modify ltm virtual /Common/luke disabled 2>&1); rc=$?; echo "$output"; if [ $rc -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: Failed (exit code $rc)"; exit 1; else echo 'Virtual server set to disabled'; fi
